description: Numbers n such that the decimal expansion of 9^n contains no zeros (probably finite).
comments: Integers in A030700 / 2. - _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014
prog: (PARI) for(n=0, 99, vecmin(digits(9^n))&& print1(n", ")) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014(MAGMA) [n: n in [0..500] | not 0 in Intseq(9^n)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 08 2014
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Offset changed to 1 and initial 0 added by _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 07 2014
